DataElement.preferredName: Assessment of Survivor Concerns Worry About Another Type Of Cancer Score Likert Scale Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how much they worry about another type of cancer, using a Likert scale value captured as a non-enumerated text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Assessment of Survivor Concerns Worry About Another Type Of Cancer Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A brief questionnaire designed to measure fears about recurrence and health in cancer survivors._A survey question about how much a person worries about having another type of cancer._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A brief questionnaire designed to measure fears about recurrence and health in cancer survivors.

Concepts.definition: A brief questionnaire designed to measure fears about recurrence and health in cancer survivors.

Property.preferredName: I Worry About Another Type Of Cancer Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A survey question about how much a person worries about having another type of cancer.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.longName: Worry About Another Type of Cancer
Concepts.definition: A question about how much an individual worries or worried about having another type of cancer.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
